text: Hagi anantarega avona eri'na Maseia negeho Neri nemofo Baruku ami'noe. E'ina'ma hu'noana nenfa negna mofavre Hanameli avufine, anama mizamasoa avontafete'ma zamazanko avoma ante'naza vahe zamavufi anazana hu'noe. Ana nehu'na maka Juda vahe'ma, kini ne'mofo kumapima sondia vahe'ma nemaniza kumapima mani'naza vahe zamavufine ana zana hu'no'e.
